## Module 8: Birds of a feather


```{r}
yw <-  occ_data(scientificName = "Setophaga petechia",
                year=2021,
                month="3,6",
                limit=500,
                country="US",
                basisOfRecord = "HUMAN_OBSERVATION",
                stateProvince="Massachusetts")[[2]]
 
```
